1. Put the files in lib/ in server/default/lib
2. Move the entire hqmf.war/ directory into server/default/deploy
3. Edit the hqmf.properties file in hqmf.war/
4. Access at http://{jboss-path}/jersey/hqmf/{service}
5. Information can be found at http://{jboss-path}/jersey/hqmf/application.wadl 
  and in the doc subdirectory which contains the javadoc
